markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 26"
    pfs=""
>
[Horns of Naraga](/Equipment.aspx?ID=614)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="Artifact" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=253" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gamemastery Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=22) pg. 109</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn headwear

**Bulk** 2
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This imposing helm bears the horns of a powerful black dragon. While wearing the _Horns of Naraga_, you gain [greater darkvision](/Rules.aspx?ID=415) and immunity to acid. If you are undead, you gain resistance 40 to positive damage. If you are not undead, the helm quickly saps the life from you, dealing 10d6 negative damage to you every round. If you die from this damage, you rise as an undead of an equal level in 1d4 rounds.

<document level="2" id="action-397" />

<document level="2" id="action-398" />

**Destruction** The helm is utterly obliterated if crushed between the jaws of an ancient black dragon’s skull located in a desert while the sun is at its zenith.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Horns of Naraga
